price: Toaa – Siin . Woi yε Qur’aan mu nsɛm, ԑyԑ Nwoma a ɛda (biribiara) adi pefee.
arabic: طسٓۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَكِتَابٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: tta-seen til'ka āyātu al-qur'āni wakitābin mubīnin
